html:
2025-0928
2025-12-11IRCCCitizenship ActOrder Fixing December 15, 2025 as the Day on Which an Act to amend the Citizenship Act (2025)Order Fixing December 15, 2025 as the Day on Which an Act to amend the Citizenship Act (2025) Comes into Force in order to establish a new framework governing citizenship by descent and provide citizenship to “Lost Canadians” and those impacted by the first-generation limit.Registration: SI/2025-0129 Publication Date: 2025-12-31
subject: Order Fixing December 15, 2025 as the Day on Which an Act to amend the Citizenship Act (2025)
precis: Order Fixing December 15, 2025 as the Day on Which an Act to amend the Citizenship Act (2025) Comes into Force in order to establish a new framework governing citizenship by descent and provide citizenship to “Lost Canadians” and those impacted by the first-generation limit.
